Santa_Barbara.KVRY-LP: KVRY-LP 99.5 MHz is a low-power FM radio station serving Santa Barbara, California and nearby Goleta. It was one of the radio stations that obtained a low-power broadcast license during the FCC's LPFM "window" for applications. After obtaining the license, KVRY-LP was granted a construction permit on February 10, 2003, and began broadcasting on February 7, 2006.
